name: Forgotten Skies
description:
The doomed dinosaur apocalypse has arrived, you will play as commander Barret on his attempt to survive the sudden apocalypse and reach safety.  However, the dinosaurs roaming around won't make it easy.

Forgotten Skies is a game where you can demo different mechanics that would appear in a final game if it was to be made. You can shoot, sneak, run, interact and explore.

HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED! for an enhanced experience.
